title: Lionel Messi reveals he does not want to leave Barcelona as he attends Cirque Du Soleil premiere
text:
Lionel Messi admits he wants to stay at Barcelona forever leaving very little chance of him trying a different league.

The only doubts about the Argentine superstar's career in comparison to Cristiano Ronaldo is whether he could perform in another league.

But Messi insists he wants to stay at the Nou Camp.

Argentinian star Lionel Messi poses with wife Antonella Roccuzzo during the premiere

Messi (R) and Antonella Rocuzzo (L) pose on the red carpet for the premiere of Messi10

'If they want me, I am delighted,' Messi told RAC-1. 'My idea is to stay here forever.

'It has always been like this and remains the same way; nothing has changed.

'I think nothing of my renewal has changed, I do not know much about it, but I think that there is still nothing for what I know about my father.

'Always, in all the negotiations, I have kept the margin, I have never had any problem in fixing things with the club, on the contrary, it has always been simple.

'Surely, when done, there will be no problem and it will be done at any time.'

Ansu Fati poses with family members during the premiere of the Messi10 show in Barcelona
description: Lionel Messi admits he wants to stay at Barcelona forever leaving very little chance of him trying a different league. But Messi insists he wants to stay at the Nou Camp for the foreseeable future.
